dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform
Class XFormMultiPage

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.platform.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page.AbstractPage
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page.AbstractMultiPage
              dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.XFormMultiPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.internal.IXFormPage, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
public class XFormMultiPage
extends AbstractMultiPage
implements dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.internal.IXFormPage

This class represents a multi page guided configuration dialog of which the GUI is built up via an XML description.

The default implementation reads an XML file that is defined in the plugin.xml file that registers the wizard: 

  <extension
  point="dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin.guidedconfigwizard">
  <guidedconfigwizard 
  id="draft">
  <gui class="dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.XFormMultiPage">
  <parameter name="pageDescription" value="ui/MyMultiPage.xml"/>
  </gui>
  </guidedconfigwizard>
  </extension>

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2009.a

doInit

public void doInit(AbstractBackend backend)
            throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Parses the model from the input file queried from the extension-point.

The default implementation queries the parameter IXFormPage.PARAMETER_PAGE_DESCRIPTION from the extension-point registration of the page to find a file inside the defining plug-in.

This method can only resolve files in plug-ins that are no jar files.

getFile

protected java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String plugIn,
                               java.lang.String path)
                        throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
Get the file at the given path in the given plug-in.

This method can only resolve a file if the plug-in is no jar file. If the file cannot be accessed an error is issued.

Parameters:
plugIn - the plug-in to search in
path - The path to search
Returns:
the file or null on error
Throws:
dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException - on error
Since:
2009.a

If the path cannot be resolved to a stream an error is issued.

path - The relative path
Returns:

doGetFirstPage

public AbstractPage doGetFirstPage()
This method is called to query the first page of the wizard.

This implementation instantiates all sub-pages as the list of pages is statically defined in the XML file.

Overrides:
doGetFirstPage in class AbstractMultiPage
Returns:
The first page or null if the wizard has no pages
Since:
2009.a
See Also:
AbstractMultiPage.doGetFirstPage()

doGetNextPage

public AbstractPage doGetNextPage()
This method returns the next page in a multi-page GUI.

This method is called by the wizard when the next button is pressed or to query the list of tabs in an editor.

The pages are defined statically in an XML file

Overrides:
doGetNextPage in class AbstractMultiPage
Returns:
The next page or null if there are no more pages
Since:
2009.a
See Also:
AbstractMultiPage.doGetNextPage()
